title: COMMUNITY HEALTH
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Biology/Health Science and any three (3) from the following: Nutrition, Chemistry, Physics, Religious Studies, Geography, Economics, Nigerian Language Plus at least a pass in English Language, Food and Nutrition/Home Management.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, a basic science and three (3) other subjects chosen from the following:

Economics,

Geography,

Government/History,

Further Mathematics,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Biology/Agricultural Science.

English Language,

Typewriting,

'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Physics is compulsory.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Geography, Physics, Economics or Chemistry.

title: ENVIRONMENTAL HEALTH TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Biology/Health Science and any three (3) from the following: Nutrition, Chemistry, Physics, Religious Studies, Geography, Economics, Nigerian Language Plus at least a pass in English Language, Food and Nutrition/Home Management.

title: HEALTH INFORMATION MANAGEMENT
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, English Language, Biology/Health Science and any two (2) from Chemistry, Physics, Geography, Economics, Religious Knowledge, Nigerian Language.

title: PUBLIC  ADMINISTRATION
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes in English Language not Literature in English and Mathematics and any three (3) subjects of the following Economics/Commerce, Business Methods, Principles of Accounts, Literature in English Geography, Office Practice Government, Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry, Physics, History/Government Typewriting Shorthand

title: STATISTICS
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Basic Science and any three (3) of the following:

Economics,

Geography,

Government/History,

Further Mathematics,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Biology/Agricultural Science.

English Language,

Typewriting,

'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Physics are compulsory.
subjects:
Any of the three (3): 
1. Economics/  
     Commerce
2. History/Government
3. CRS/IS
4. Mathematics
